head.title: Nordonia Hills City School District News Article

input.name: __VIEWSTATE

div.style: position: absolute; width: 100%; height: 100%; left: 0px; background: #FFFFFF;

div.h3: Inspiring Every Student to Value Learning, Community and Excellence

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Thank you for your continued support and flexibility as we work through these unprecedented times. As you know, to help prevent the community spread of COVID-19, the Nordonia Schools will be closed to students now through Tuesday, May 1. Students are currently scheduled to return on May 4.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: I hope you enjoyed your Spring Break. Online learning begins again Wednesday, April 15.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: I have one item for you today.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: #ffffff; font-weight: 400; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Nordonia High School junior Louis Hover is spearheading a community Earth Day project in which volunteers will clean all Nordonia school grounds. The event will take place Wednesday, April 22, and volunteers must remember that social distancing is a must.

li.style: list-style-type: circle; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: #ffffff; font-weight: 400; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Times and locations are specific, so only one crew is on one side of a building at a time, and times are spread out to avoid people coming as others are leaving, therefore not allowing any interactions. The event will take place from 9-11 a.m. with each crew having either a 9-10 a.m. slot or a 10-11 a.m. slot. Volunteers must only come during their assigned times to avoid interaction with others.

li.style: list-style-type: circle; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: #ffffff; font-weight: 400; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Volunteers must bring their own supplies (trash bags, gloves, and something to pick up the trash).

li.style: list-style-type: circle; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: #ffffff; font-weight: 400; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: This is a first come first serve basis. Once a location and time is taken, we can not allow any more workers. There are slots for 99 volunteers.

li.style: list-style-type: circle; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: High school students may receive community service hours for participating.

li.style: list-style-type: circle; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; color: #1155cc; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.style: list-style-type: circle; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: #222222; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: #ffffff; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Here is a link to the flyer:

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Special thanks to Louis Hover for leading this effort.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: These are unprecedented times, and we will get through them together through flexibility and common sense. Please understand this closure is not only to keep students and staff safe, but also to prevent the spread of COVID-19 as seen in other countries around the world.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: As always, thanks for your continued support of the Nordonia Schools, and Go Knights!

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

span.br:
9370 Olde Eight Rd. Northfield, OH 44067
Phone: 330.467.0580 | Fax: 330.468.0152

div.h3: Inspiring Every Student to Value Learning, Community and Excellence
